content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Disable Zero Trust Secure Access pop-up notifications in Mac and Windows July 15, 2024—Users can now turn off Private Access system alerts for blocked access attempts from Secure Access Module settings. While pop-ups are disabled, a complete log of blocked events remains accessible within the module. Zero Trust Secure Access → Secure access configuration For more Information, see Secure Access Module deployment. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Disable Zero Trust Secure Access pop-up notifications in Mac and Windows
